name: YouTube Transcript Extractor
description: Extract transcripts from YouTube videos using intelligent fallback methods (API → HTML → yt-dlp). Supports multiple languages and formats.

inputs.name: Output File
inputs.description: Path to save the transcript (optional, defaults to stdout)

inputs.name: Language
inputs.description: Transcript language code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr'). Defaults to video's primary language.

author: Brandon Hoff

examples.name: Extract transcript to file
examples.description: Extract transcript and save to markdown file
